short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show copy button on AtCoder problem page which copies problem as markdown format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Copy" button to AtCoder problem pages. It allows you to copy problems in Markdown format, making it easy to paste them into notebook apps like Obsidian. You can then create your own explanations for the problems.
